import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class Main
{
	public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException
	{
		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		byte[] no = new byte[10];
		byte largest=0;
		byte pos =0;
		for(byte i=0,j=9;i<10;i++)
			no[i] = Byte.parseByte(br.readLine());
		for(byte i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			if(no[i]>largest)
			{
				largest = no[i];
				pos = i;
			}
		}
		while(no[pos]>0)
		{
			for(byte i=0;i<10;i++)
			{
				if(no[i] - no[pos] < 0)
					System.out.print(" ");
				else
					System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println();
			no[pos] -= 1;
		}
	}
}
